mapper.insert: insert into house(house_name, style_id, floor_id, state, insert_time) values (#{houseName}, #{styleId}, #{floorId}, "空闲", current_timestamp)
mapper.select: select house.*, FORMAT(style.num * style.area, 2) as price, style.area, style.balcony, style.style_name from house, style where house.style_id = style.style_id and house.floor_id = #{floorId} and house.state != '删除' ORDER BY house_name
select house_name from house where floor_id = #{floorId} and state != '删除'
select a.rent_id, b.house_name from rent as a, house as b where a.house_id = b.house_id and a.state = 1

select FORMAT(b.price * b.area, 2) as price from house as a, style as b, rent as c, cost as d where d.rent_id = c.rent_id and c.house_id = a.house_id and a.style_id = b.style_id and d.cost_id = #{costId}

select (SUM(d.price) + (e.area * e.price)) as deposit from house as a, rent as b, miscellaneous as c, basic as d, style as e where b.rent_id = #{rentId} and b.rent_id = c.rent_id and c.base_id = d.base_id and c.state != 0 and a.house_id = b.house_id and a.style_id = e.style_id

select a.house_name, b.style_name, b.area, FORMAT(b.price * b.area, 2) as price, b.balcony, c.login as loginTime from house as a, style as b, rent as c where c.user_id = #{userId} and a.style_id = b.style_id and a.house_id = c.house_id
select count(*) from house where house_name = #{houseName} and state = "已租"
